entry.title: 3M AB55530 - 3M Hookit Clean Sanding Sheet 236U, 3 in x 4 in P320 C-weight, 50 per inner 500 per case AB55530 7000119612
entry.summary:
Vendor: 3M
Type:
Price: 0.58

[shortdesc]

3M Hookit Clean Sanding Sheet 236U, 3 in x 4 in P320 C-weight, 50 per inner 500 per case

  • The 3M™ Hookit™ Clean Sanding Sheet 236U offers superior dust control, aggressive cut, and long life on a premium aluminum oxide sheet with a durable edge and convenient 3M™ Hookit™ Attachment
  • It features a proprietary multi-hole clean sanding pattern that evacuates dust better than traditional sheet products — dramatically increasing sheet life.
    • [/shortdesc][additional] DOWNLOAD SPEC SHEET [/additional]

    Product Information

    Brand 3M
    Origin Country Canada

    Product Information

  • Premium aluminum oxide mineral with a resin bond is durable, cuts fast, and performs well on many surfaces
  • Precise multi-hole pattern achieves superior dust extraction when used with a vacuum system
  • Strong, C-weight paper backing resists tearing and supports aggressive sanding with extra durability compared to lighter weight paper backings
  • Open coat construction and load-resistant coating prevent premature loading of the disc surface to maximize cut and extend abrasive life
  • 3M Hookit sheets provide reliable attachment and are easy to change and reuse, maximizing sanding utility for the life of the sheet
    		•

[shortdesc]

3M Wetordry Paper Sheet, 413Q, 14945, 600, A-weight, 4 1/2 in x 5 1/2 in (11.43 cm x 13.97 cm)

  • Primarily used in the metalworking and woodworking industries, the 3M™ Wetordry™ Paper Sheet 413Q is a silicon carbide, closed coat product bonded with a waterproof resin

entry.title: 3M 33900 - 3M Paint Defect Removal Abrasive Card, 33900, 2500, 2.4 in x 4.5 in (6.2 cm x 11.5 cm) 33900 7100054075
entry.summary:
Vendor: 3M
Type:
Price: 32.88

[shortdesc]

3M Paint Defect Removal Abrasive Card, 33900, 2500, 2.4 in x 4.5 in (6.2 cm x 11.5 cm)

  • The 3M™ Paint Defect Removal Abrasive Card 2500 grade allows you to remove dirt nibs and other paint defects, while minimizing the repair area size
  • The smaller the repair, the less compounding and polishing is required
  • This product may be used both dry and wet.
    • [/shortdesc][additional] DOWNLOAD SPEC SHEET [/additional]

    Product Information

    Brand 3M
    Origin Country United States

    Product Information

  • Easy to adopt and use
  • Faster nib removal
  • SMART (small area repair technique)
  • Increases productivity
  • May be used both dry and wet
    		•

entry.title: 3M 36187 - 3M Hookit Blue Abrasive Sheet Roll, 321U, 36187, 80, 2-3/4 in x 13 yd (69.85 mm x 11.88 m) 36187 7100091037
entry.summary:
Vendor: 3M
Type:
Price: 40.75

[shortdesc]

3M Hookit Blue Abrasive Sheet Roll, 321U, 36187, 80, 2-3/4 in x 13 yd (69.85 mm x 11.88 m)

  • From body repair to paint prep, 3M™ Blue Abrasives are all you need
  • Engineered with a ceramic mineral blend, 3M™ Hookit™ Blue Abrasive Sheet Rolls deliver best-in-class performance at every stage, with a specially-designed multi-hole pattern that helps reduce loading and extend disc life, while easily aligning with most backup pads.
    • [/shortdesc][additional] DOWNLOAD SPEC SHEET [/additional]

    Product Information

    Brand 3M
    Origin Country Canada

    Product Information

  • Best-in-class performance with the right balance of ceramic grain and aluminum oxide
  • Anti-loading coating helps prevent dust and debris from clogging the surface
  • Multi-hole pattern delivers excellent dust extraction and reduces loading
  • Upgraded resins improve durability and finish
  • 3M™ Hookit™ Sheets are easy to attach, remove and reuse
    		•
